name: Pumpkin Patch (RBD Interactive, Creepy Rebel, PlasticCogLiquid)
name_original: Pumpkin Patch (RBD Interactive, Creepy Rebel, PlasticCogLiquid)
description:
There's a little cemetary located in Silverton Colorado where legend says a very magical species of pumpkin grows during halloween night, but none whom ever tried to harvest them is ever heard from again. You've decided to take matters into your own hands so grandma can finally have the magic pumpkin spice for the ultimate pumpkin pies.         Little did you know what awaits.....

Controls

WASD : Move

Left Click : Attack

Hold Right Click : Block

Hold Left Shift : Sprint

Credits

@Renderbydavid Code, Graphics

@PlasticCogLiquid Sound, Music

@CreepyRebel Page banner, thumbnail & background
